page.title: 17GIRLS IN CARLTON IN THE '80S
page.content: Girls should have more{equal}rights.A} lot of girls and boys,when asked,say women should not be mechanics.I disagree with them,they say women shouldn't get dirty,and it's a man's job which is wrong.If men think it is too dirty for women to be mechanics they are wrong because who changes the nappies of young children?{Women!Thats about the{dirtiest job I can think of. There are still some jobs which are difficult to get or which women aren't allowed to do.Most people say women{should be able to do computer work. Some boys say that girls should not play certain sports like football and cricket.They say yes but{not with us.That is worse than saying no.Most boys say girls are terrible at sport if so thats because they don't get any {practice.A lot of women give up hope. Tamsin Woodward Age 11
